title: 3 and Out - Belichick Swagger Back, Cowboys Dominate, Not Buying Cam's Comeback, Fire Sark
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Belichick Swagger Back, Cowboys Dominate, Not Buying Cam's Comeback, Fire Sark
description:
John gives his top line reaction from Week 10, including Bill Belichick continuing to get his swagger back with a dog walking of the Browns, why he's bullish on the Cowboys as Super Bowl contenders, and why he's not buying Cam's Carolina comeback. He also makes the case for Texas to admit their mistake and fire Steve Sarkisian as soon as possible after a historically bad home loss against Big 12 bottom feeder Kansas.

Subscribe NOW and follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates! Check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
